title: Maco Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Italian, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An inviting homey space with art, music and food. The menu blends European and Oaxacan cuisine, which is always made-in-house to order including bagels, pasta, panini and pizza with vegan choices. Has a special vegan menu of the week. Drinks include hot chocolate, organic coffee, juices. Pet and bike friendly. Also has a lounge for yoga and other classes, photo or painting exhibitions, art workshops and more. Uses mostly local and organic products. Wi-fi.
